title: Bahrains' Investcorp acquires sports gear firm POP for $65 mln
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
DUBAI, Oct 8 (Reuters) - Bahrain-based Investcorp said it has acquired sports equipment manufacturer POP for $65 million from its U.S. based...
